titles.title: A bill to direct the Comptroller General of the United States to complete a study on barriers to participation in federally funded cancer clinical trials by populations that have been traditionally underrepresented in such trials.
Henrietta Lacks Enhancing Cancer Research Act of 2019
Henrietta Lacks Enhancing Cancer Research Act of 2019
Henrietta Lacks Enhancing Cancer Research Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
